job_description:
• Minimum of 2 years of experience using personal protective equipment (PPE) and safely handling gases and chemicals in a controlled environment.
• Partners with Operations, Facilities, Gas/Chemical Technicians, Engineers, and Leaders to resolve issues and support production needs.
• Associate or Bachelor’s degree in a STEM related field (or equivalent trade school/military experience) Adhere to all safety protocols, contamination control guidelines, and clean room requirements.
• Previous hands-on experience working in a laboratory or cleanroom environment.
• Oversee the performance and reliability of contamination control systems, including cleanroom, UPW, chemical delivery, and process tool environments.
• Execute detailed preventative maintenance on highly technical facilities equipment to improve uptime and system stability.
• Knowledge of cleanroom principles, airflow dynamics, filtration, AMC, ESD, ionization, and analytical testing methods.
• Intermediate level understanding of statistics and an ability to make informed decisions using statistical data.
